languages.text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Укрепляет выбранный сектор {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} пустотного корабля. Укрепление действует до получения {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Укрепленный сектор имеет больше шансов поглотить атаку противника и теряет только половину прочности при поглощении урона.
С 50% вероятностью может быть укреплен еще один сектор щитов.
Использование этой способности нейтрализует предыдущие укрепления.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
A chosen sector of the flagship's voidshields is reinforced until it suffers damage. The reinforced sector has increased chances to absorb the enemy attack and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector.
Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1–3 rounds at random.</indent>

A chosen sector of the flagship's voidshields is reinforced until it suffers damage. The reinforced sector has increased chances to absorb enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector.
Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1–3 rounds at random.</indent>

A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Укрепляет выбранный сектор {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} пустотного корабля. Укрепление действует до получения {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Укрепленный сектор имеет больше шансов поглотить атаку противника и теряет только половину прочности при поглощении урона.
С 50% вероятностью может быть укреплен еще один сектор щитов.
Использование этой способности нейтрализует предыдущие укрепления.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Ein ausgewählter Sektor der {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Raumschilde{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} wird verstärkt, bis er {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet.
Der verstärkte Sektor kann feindliche Angriffe mit erhöhter Wahrscheinlichkeit abwehren und verliert beim Absorbieren von Schaden nur die Hälfte seiner Stärke.
Ein weiterer Sektor kann mit einer Chance von 50 % verstärkt werden. Der Einsatz dieser Fähigkeit entfernt frühere Verstärkungen.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Ein ausgewählter Sektor der Raumschiffschilde des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} wird verstärkt, bis er Schäden erleidet. Der verstärkte Sektor kann feindliche Angriffe mit erhöhter Wahrscheinlichkeit abwehren und verliert beim Absorbieren von Schäden nur die Hälfte seiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
Ein weiterer Sektor kann mit einer Chance von 50 % verstärkt werden.
Der Einsatz dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} entfernt vorherige Verstärkungen.
<indent=5 %>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: zufällig 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Un secteur choisi des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} est renforcé jusqu'à ce qu'il subisse des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
Le secteur renforcé a plus de chances d'absorber les attaques ennemies et, ce faisant, ne perd que la moitié de sa force.
Il y a 50 % de chances de renforcer un secteur supplémentaire. L'utilisation de cette capacité supprime les renforts précédents.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Un secteur choisi des boucliers du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} est renforcé jusqu'à ce qu'il subisse des dégâts. Le secteur renforcé a plus de chances d'absorber les attaques ennemies et ce faisant ne perd que la moitié de sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}force{/g}.
Il y a 50 % de chances de renforcer un secteur supplémentaire.
L'utilisation de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} supprime les renforts précédents.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
强化{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}的选定区域，效果持续至该区域承受{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}为止。
强化后的区域有更高几率吸收敌人的攻击，吸收伤害时仅仅损失一半护盾强度。
此能力有50%几率额外强化一片区域。再次使用此能力会移除之前的强化区域。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
强化{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}的选定区域，效果持续至该区域承受{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}为止。
强化后的区域有更高几率吸收敌人的攻击，吸收伤害时仅仅损失一半护盾强度。
此能力有50%几率额外强化一片区域。再次使用此能力会移除之前的强化区域。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>

languages.text:
Un sector elegido de los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} de vacío de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} queda reforzado hasta que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daños{/g}.
El sector reforzado tiene más probabilidad de absorber ataques enemigos y solo pierde la mitad de la potencia al absorber daños.
Tiene una probabilidad del 50 % de reforzar un sector adicional. Usar esta capacidad elimina los refuerzos anteriores.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El sector seleccionado de los escudos del vacío de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} se refuerza hasta que reciba daño. El sector reforzado tiene más probabilidades de absorber ataques enemigos y solo pierde la mitad de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}potencia{/g} al absorber daño.
Tiene una probabilidad del 50 % de reforzar un sector adicional.
Usar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} elimina los refuerzos anteriores.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}ヴォイドシールド{/g}の選ばれたセクターが{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるまで強化される。
強化されたセクターは敵の攻撃を吸収する確率が増加し、ダメージを吸収する際に腕力の半分しか失わない。50％の確率で追加セクターが強化される。なお、このアビリティを使用すると、それまでの強化は取り除かれる。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>1～3</u>ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
There is a 50% chance to reinforce an additional sector. Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のヴォイドシールドの選ばれたセクターはダメージを受けるまで強化される。強化されたセクターは敵の攻撃を吸収する確率が増え、ダメージを吸収しても{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}強度{/g}の半分しか失われない。
50％の確率で追加のセクターが強化される。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用すると以前の強化が失われる。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}： 1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム）</indent>
